short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Custom shortcuts to frequently visited resources. Type less, redirect fast.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quick shortcuts for your address bar!

- Create unlimited amount of shortcuts for your favorite resources and go.
- Specify custom command to run you link (go/, to/, run/, r/ or something you want).
- The extension doesn't send your data to remote - it stores on your device, so only you own it.
